description: An easy, fast Italian dish that hits the spot!
name: Chorizo Rosmarino Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Slice up all your hot or mild chorizo sausage.

In a pot add a dash of oil and turn on high heat. Throw in the chorizo and Rosmarino pasta and stir well. Toasting the pasta now gives it more flavour later.I get my Rosmarino pasta from an Italian delicatessen. Itâ€™s the size of cucumber seeds.
Add in the veggie mix, 3 cups of water, salt and pepper. Put lid on and cook for 10 minutes.
The dish should have absorbed water but if it hasn't, take lid off and continuously stir for 5-10minutes, til water evaporates. It should have a risotto consistency.
Turn off and serve with cheese on top.
